name: Japanese Dictionary Rikai
description: Japanese English dictionary (Rikai Jisho) designed simple but very adequate for people learning Japanese. Rikai including Japan - English, English - Japanese Kanji. Full-lookup feature using Kanji, Hiragana, Romanji, voice and drawings Kanji   Basic features: - Look up words in the Japanese language, english, Romanji, hiragana - Pronounce online, Romanji and hiragana - Look kanji with full stroke - Learn to write kanji, demonstrates how to write a kanji - JLPT N1, N2, N3, N4, N5, kanji, vocabulary - My vocabulary, highlight and organize your vocabulary effectively - Flashcard, practicing vocabulary, kanji flashcard method for remembering simpler.  Data: - More than 170,000 word dictionary Japanese - English - More than 12000 letters kanjii; - More than 120,000 examples.  When you need immediate assistance, please contact by mail: eup.mobi@gmail.com
